ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:13:37 [Issue ID 4000-103746] urn:comicvine:4000-103746 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 06:53:12. [Issue ID 103746]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ed Benes,Jim Lee,Travis Charest,Ed Benes,Jim Lee,Travis Charest
ComicInfo.Summary: Final issue. In three separate yet related tales the WildC.A.T.s bring closure to many of their loose ends while setting the stage for their future. "Old Feelings!" Story by James Robinson. Art by Jim Lee and Scott Williams. Spartan and Voodoo discuss their past and future together on the team. All while in the middle of a life or death battle with the villainous Slag. "The Last Goodbye!" Story by Brandon Choi and Jonathon Peterson. Art by Ed Benes, Al Vey, and JD. Max Cash says his final goodbyes before expiring. Grifter tracks down his brother's assassin and learns this was a vendetta that reached across the sands of time. "Reincarnation!" Story by Alan Moore. Art by Travis Charest and JD. Savant, Grifter, Majestic, and Maxine Manchester are confronted by a forgotten villain. Plus, the seeds for the future are planted. Includes and afterward by Jim Lee, a 4-pages preview sketchbook for the new Wildcats series by Scott Lobdell and Travis Charest, and a pinup of the team by Scott Williams. Cover by Jim Lee and Scott Williams.
ComicInfo.Title: Old Feelings!
